Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Overland Drive, just east of Eidenhoft Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: Overland Drive intersects with Eidenhoft Boulevard to the west. On the south side of the street, you can see the Odgen Family Villa, where much of the politics of the city are usually decided. The Odgen Family have their hands in nearly every aspect of the political activity in the city, and they even have some connections with Lyanden Castle.
